title: “You’re the GM” returns!
itunes:title: “You’re the GM” returns!
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling & Gregg Rosenthal – recap all the latest news from around the NFL including the Raiders considering trying to bring Marshawn Lynch out of retirement, and the Giants agreeing to a new deal with JPP. Then, by popular demand, the heroes bring back one of their favorite segments…”You’re the GM!” where the heroes act as general managers in the NFL and try to get their own trades through.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
